name: jquery-datetimepicker-legacy
description: jQuery Plugin DateTimePicker Legacy it is DatePicker and TimePicker in one with extended browser support

scripts.minify: uglifyjs jquery.datetimepicker.js -c -m -o build/jquery.datetimepicker.min.js && uglifycss jquery.datetimepicker.css > build/jquery.datetimepicker.min.css
scripts.build:js: babel build/jquery.datetimepicker.min.js -o build/jquery.datetimepicker.legacy.min.js --compact && babel build/jquery.datetimepicker.full.min.js -o build/jquery.datetimepicker.legacy.full.min.js --compact && babel build/jquery.datetimepicker.full.js -o build/jquery.datetimepicker.legacy.full.js
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run concat && npm run minifyconcat && npm run test && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version%" && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master && npm publish
scripts.public: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run github
scripts.test: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
